Intern - Spark Platform Data Encoding Developer Location: Bellevue, WA (R&D;) Req #: 9606 # of Openings: 1 DescriptionFuturewei Technologies, a subsidiary of Huawei, is looking for highly motivated and qualified students or recent graduates for internships within the Cloud R&D; center located in Bellevue, WA, just a few minutes from Seattle. As an Intern Spark Platform Data Encoding Developer at Futurewei, you will use your Scala/Java programming skills and Spark system internal knowledge to develop new schemes to encode data of Parquet and of Carbondata formats so that disk storage needs for said data formats are reduced and query execution speed is gained as disk I/O is reduced.You will design and develop new and innovative encoding schemes with either heuristic based or ML based approach to strike a balance between encode/decode overhead and storage savings. Job Responsibilities:Produce quality code that enables system to automatically encode and decode data of Parquet and of Carbondata formats, where the encoded data reduces I/O cost and can be used as-is without being decoded for optimized path of Spark SQL query execution.Qualifications:Currently pursuing MS or higher degree in Computer Science, Applied Math, or Engineering related fields.
